name: fullstack-assistant
description: Complete developer learning paths for 65+ roles from https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap. Navigate frontend, backend, DevOps, AI/Data, security, product, and career growth with 7 specialized agents and comprehensive learning resources.
author: Claude Code

agents.name: Frontend & Mobile Developer
agents.description: Expert in frontend frameworks (React, Vue, Angular) and mobile development (iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter)

agents.name: Backend & Database Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in backend technologies (Node.js, Python, Java), databases (SQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB), and API design

agents.name: DevOps & Cloud Architect
agents.description: Expert in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and infrastructure automation

agents.name: Data Science & AI Engineer
agents.description: Specialist in machine learning, data engineering, AI development, and MLOps workflows

agents.name: Security & Systems Designer
agents.description: Expert in cybersecurity, system design, software architecture, and design patterns

agents.name: Product & QA Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in product management, UX design, design systems, and quality assurance

agents.name: DevRel & Growth Strategist
agents.description: Expert in developer relations, technical writing, engineering management, and growth strategies

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start a guided learning path for any developer role

commands.name: explore-roles
commands.description: Explore and compare all 65+ developer roles

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Assess your current knowledge and get personalized recommendations

commands.name: recommend
commands.description: Get role recommendations based on your skills and interests
